name: Chopstick Restaurant
text:
Here is the plain text transcription of the menu images you provided.
APPETIZERS
Rice Roll ... $4.95 Cantonese Style Egg Roll ... $3.95 Gyoza ... $6.95 Edamame ... $6.25
SOUP
Consommé Soup with Fried Noodles ... $3.95 Chinese Green Vegetable Soup ... $5.95 Won Ton Soup with B.B.Q. Pork ... SM $7.95 / LRG $9.95 Subgum Noodle Soup ... $11.95 (Noodles, shrimp, BBQ pork & vegetables)
FRIED RICE
Chopstick's Special Fried Rice ... $15.95 Chicken Fried Rice ... $13.95 Beef or Pork Fried Rice ... $13.95 B.B.Q. Pork Fried Rice ... $13.95 Shrimp Fried Rice ... $15.95 Plain Fried Rice ... $11.95 Mushroom Fried Rice ... $13.95 Vegetable Fried Rice ... $13.95 (Mushrooms, broccoli, celery) Steamed White Rice (per bowl) ... SM $3.00 / MED $3.50 / LRG $4.00
SWEET & SOUR
Sweet & Sour Chicken Balls ... $20.95 Sweet & Sour Bon Bons ... $21.95 Sweet & Sour Shrimps ... $20.95 Sweet & Sour Won Tons ... $15.95 Sweet & Crispy Fried Chicken ... $19.95 Sweet & Sour Sauce ... SM $3.50 / MED $4.00 / LRG $5.50
CHOP SUEY
Chicken Chop Suey ... $14.95 Beef or Pork Chop Suey ... $14.95 Mushroom Chop Suey ... $14.95 Shrimp Chop Suey ... $19.95 B.B.Q. Pork Chop Suey ... $15.95
CHICKEN
Soo Guy with Almond or Lemon Sauce ... $21.95 Soo Guy with Mushroom Sauce ... $21.95 Guy Ding (diced chicken with almonds) ... $16.95 Cantonese Chicken (sliced chicken with green peppers, garlic, ginger, and black bean sauce) ... $19.95 Chicken with Mixed Greens ... $15.95
BEEF
Plain Chinese Mixed Greens ... $15.95 Beef with Chinese Mixed Greens ... $15.95 Sliced Beef with Broccoli ... $15.95 Ginger Beef with Hot Bean Sauce ... $21.95 (With our Chef's unique sauce, stir fried with green and red peppers and onions)
SPARE RIBS
Honey Garlic Spare Ribs ... $20.95 Sizzling Bon Bon Spare Ribs ... $20.95
PORK & FRESH SHRIMP
Dai Jug Woey ... $29.95 (For 2 people. Marinated chicken, shrimp, B.B.Q. pork, and Chinese mixed greens)
SZECHUAN DISHES (Authentic, hot & spicy)
Szechuan Chicken, Beef or Pork ... $16.95 Szechuan Shrimp ... $19.95 Szechuan Chicken, Beef or Pork Noodle ... $18.95 Szechuan Shrimp Noodle ... $21.95
KUM PO STYLE
Chicken, Beef or Pork ... $16.95 Fresh Shrimp ... $20.95 (This is real Szechuan stir fried in a tangy flavorful garlic sauce with green and red peppers, mushrooms, onion, hot chili peppers, celery, sesame oil, and toasted peanuts)
CHOW MEIN (crunchy noodles)
Chicken Chow Mein ... $15.95 Beef or Pork Chow Mein ... $15.95 Shrimp Chow Mein ... $21.95 Vegetable Chow Mein ... $15.95 B.B.Q. Pork Chow Mein ... $15.95 Small Cantonese Special Chow Mein (Soft noodles) ... $21.95 Large Cantonese Special Chow Mein (Soft noodles) ... $29.95
LO MEIN (soft noodles)
Plain Lo Mein ... $14.95 Chicken / Beef / Pork Lo Mein ... $18.95 (Egg noodles with bean sprouts, onion, our special sauce, and your choice of meat) Fresh Shrimp Lo Mein ... $21.95 Singapore Noodles ... $21.95 Rice Noodle Bowl ... $20.95
BEVERAGES
Juice ... $2.50 Soft Drink ... $2.50 Coffee / Tea / Chinese Tea ... $2.50
COMBINATION DINNERS $19.95

SPECIAL FULL COURSE FAMILY DINNERS

Dinner for Two ... $38.95 Consommé Soup, 2 Egg Rolls, Sweet & Sour Chicken Balls, Chicken Chow Mein, Chicken Fried Rice
Dinner for Three ... $53.95 Consommé Soup, 3 Egg Rolls, Honey Garlic Spare Ribs, Sweet & Sour Shrimp, Beef with Chinese Mixed Greens, Chicken Fried Rice
Dinner for Four ... $69.95 Consommé Soup, 4 Egg Rolls, Sizzling Bon Bon Spare Ribs, Sweet & Sour Chicken Balls, Beef with Chinese Mixed Greens, Chicken Fried Rice
Dinner for Five ... $99.95 Consommé Soup, 5 Egg Rolls, Sweet & Sour Shrimps, Sweet & Sour Chicken Balls, Honey Garlic Spare Ribs, Beef with Chinese Mixed Greens, Beef Lo Mein, Chicken Fried Rice
Dinner for Six ... $119.95 Consommé Soup, 6 Egg Rolls, Sweet & Sour Shrimp, Sizzling Bon Bon Spare Ribs, Honey Garlic Ribs, Dai Jug Woey, Sweet & Sour Chicken Balls, Chopstick's Special Fried Rice
LUNCHEON SPECIAL COMBINATIONS (11:00 am - 2:00 pm)
EAT IN - TAKE OUT PRICE: $14.95

BEEF & CHINESE MIXED GREENS + I. SWEET & SOUR CHICKEN BALLS J. BON BONS SPARERIBS K. SWEET & SOUR SHRIMP
SUSHI
1. VEGE ROLL ... $9.99 Avocado, cucumber, and carrot topped with sesame 2. CUCUMBER ... $6.99 CUCUMBER MAKI ROLL 3. CALIFORNIA ROLL ... $9.99 Crab meat, mayo, avocado, and cucumber topped with sesame 4. CRUNCHY ROLL ... $12.95 Shrimp tempura, crab meat, mayo, cucumber, avocado, tempura crumb, and topped with unagi sauce 5. RAINBOW ROLL ... $11.99 California roll topped with raw salmon, raw tuna, and avocado slices 6. RED DRAGON ROLL ... $11.99 California roll topped with raw salmon 7. GREEN DRAGON ROLL ... $12.95 Shrimp tempura, crab meat, mayo, cucumber topped with avocado slices and unagi sauce 8. EEL ROLL ... $12.95 California roll topped with B.B.Q. eel and unagi sauce 9. COLE ROLL ... $13.95 Shrimp tempura, crab meat, cucumber topped with salmon, green onion, masago, and special sauce 10. MASAGO ROLL ... $12.99 Shrimp tempura, cucumber, and avocado topped with masago 11. PHILADELPHIA ROLL ... $12.99 Raw salmon, cucumber and cream cheese topped with masago 12. SPICY TUNA ROLL ... $12.99 Spicy tuna, cucumber, and green onion 13. TUNA MAKI ROLL ... $10.99 Raw tuna 14. SPICY CALIFORNIA ROLL ... $10.95 Spicy crab meat, cucumber, avocado and volcano sauce 15. SPICY SALMON ROLL ... $11.95 Raw salmon, cucumber topped with hot sauce 16. VEGE TEMPURA ROLL ... $11.99 Yam tempura, cucumber, and avocado 17. SUSHI COMBO ... $24.95 1 Cali Roll - 6 Nigiri - 4 Sashimi
NIGIRI
SAKE (Raw salmon) ... $2.50 MAGURO (Raw tuna) ... $2.50 SASHIMI (7 Pieces) ... $13.95 (Raw slices of your choice salmon or tuna) EBI (Shrimp) ... $2.50 UNAGI (B.B.Q. eel) ... $2.50 MASAGO (Fish egg) ... $2.50
PARTY TRAY
2 cali roll, 2 crunchy roll, and 2 masago roll ... (Price cut off) 3 cole roll and 3 crunchy roll ... (Price cut off)
